steps.name: Given  the base_uri of the application
Given  user sends a sign in request with the following data
When  the user sends the post request to "/auth/sign-in" with the request payload
Then  the status code should be 201
Given  a user sends booking request with following data
When  the user sends the authorized post request to "/bookings/client" with the request payload
Then  the status code should be 400
